title: Is Riot trying to phase out Marksman-Support bot lanes?
body: Now this isn't another, "As an ADC main I hate the meta and Riot should cater to me" type of rant. I'm genuinely curious if Riot is trying to blend bot lane duos with more than just the typical Marksman-Support lane. With the introduction of Cinderhulk and better health items, ADCs had a hard time dealing with this new tank meta. Marksmen mains this season have been mostly restricted to playing Sivir and Corki, not due to their damage, but due to their utility to their team. In previous seasons, I would be able to pick almost any marksman and be viable to my team, but it is not the case in Season 5. At this point I would expect a sort of item rework or balance changes, but nothing seemed to come out of any patches that improved marksman game play. Instead, AP mages got a new item rework and now Mordekaiser is being introduced as a "bot lane juggernaut" to replace the marksman role. If a Rioter could clue me in, and many other marksmen mains, about the general state of marksmen or if there are plans to phase out marksman-support bot lanes.
